original_text: And he said unto them in his doctrine, Beware of the scribes, which love to go in long clothing, and love salutations in the marketplaces,
korean_text: 예수께서 가르치실 때에 이르시되 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것과 시장에서 문안 받는 것과

sentences.original_text: And he said unto them in his doctrine,
which love to go in long clothing,
and love salutations in the marketplaces,
